BMI < 18.5 kg/ m2) should aim to gain 12.5–18 kg, women who are normal weight at the 
start of pregnancy (i.e. BMI 18.5–24.9 kg/ m2) should aim to gain 11.5–16 kg, overweight women (i.e. BMI 
25–29.9 k g /m2) should aim to gain 7–11.5 kg, and obese women(i.e. BMI > 30 kg/ m2) should aim to gain 
5–9 kg.
• Most evidence on healthy eating and exercise interventions comes from high-income countries (HICs), 
and the GDG noted that that there are at least 40 ongoing trials in HICs in this field. The
